languages.text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядные умственные способности{/d} были отмечены в твоем профиле. Если ты найдешь способ проявить их на службе династии фон Валанциус... что ж. Тем лучше".

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядные умственные способности{/d} были отмечены в твоем профиле. Если ты найдешь способ проявить их на службе династии фон Валанциус... что ж. Тем лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your remarkable mental abilities were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your remarkable mental abilities were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your remarkable mental abilities were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

languages.text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉微微侧过了头。{/n}“你的个人经历让我看到了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}卓越的才能{/d}。如果你能以其他方式来展现才华，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益而战……嗯，那就更好了。”
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉微微侧过了头。{/n}“你的个人经历让我看到了你卓越的才能。如果你能以其他方式来展现才华，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益而战……嗯，那就更好了。”

languages.text: «Además...». {n}Theodora inclina un poco la cabeza.{/n} «Tu perfil menciona específicamente {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}tus notables capacidades mentales{/d}. Si logras darles uso al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius... mejor aún».
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: «Además...». {n}Theodora inclina un poco la cabeza.{/n} «Tu perfil menciona específicamente tus notables capacidades mentales. Si logras darles uso al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius... pues mejor».

languages.text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラは僅かに首をかしげる。{/n}「お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}卓越した精神力{/d}は、特筆に値すべきものだ。お前がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のためにそれを発揮するすべを見つけられれば…これ以上のことはない」
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラは僅かに首をかしげる。{/n}「お前の卓越した精神力は、特筆に値すべきものだ。お前がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のためにそれを発揮するすべを見つけられれば…これ以上のことはない」
「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラは僅かに首をかしげる。{/n}「お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}卓越した精神力{/d}は、特筆に値すべきものだ。お前がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のためにそれを発揮するすべを見つけられれば…これ以上のことはない」

languages.text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora en inclinant légèrement la tête,{/n} votre profil fait état de vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}capacités mentales hors du commun{/d}. Si vous trouvez un moyen de les mettre au service de la dynastie von Valancius... ma foi, tant mieux. »
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora en inclinant légèrement la tête,{/n} votre profil fait état de vos capacités mentales hors du commun. Si vous trouvez un moyen de les mettre au service de la dynastie von Valancius... ma foi, tant mieux. »

languages.text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora neigt leicht den Kopf,{/n} "werden Eure {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}erstaunlichen mentalen Fähigkeiten{/d} in Eurem Profil erwähnt. Wenn Ihr einen Weg findet, sie in Diensten der Dynastie derer von Valancius einzusetzen ... nun. Umso besser."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora neigt leicht den Kopf,{/n} "werden Eure erstaunlichen mentalen Fähigkeiten in Eurem Profil erwähnt. Wenn Ihr einen Weg findet, sie in Diensten der Dynastie derer von Valancius einzusetzen ... nun. Umso besser."

languages.text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Biyografinde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}olağanüstü zihinsel yetilerinin{/d} altı çizilmiş. Onları von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetine sunmanın bir yolunu bulursan... Eh, ne kadar meziyetin olursa o kadar iyi."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}remarkable mental abilities{/d} were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Biyografinde olağanüstü zihinsel yetilerinin altı çizilmiş. Onları von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetine sunmanın bir yolunu bulursan... Eh, ne kadar meziyetin olursa o kadar iyi."

languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora inclines her head slightly.{/n} "Your remarkable mental abilities were noted in your profile. If you can find a way to exhibit them in the service of the von Valancius dynasty... well. So much the better."
